statement.p: In 38.71 of the last 31 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{31}}={0.3871}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{31}. \displaystyle{P}={0.3871}\cdot{31}={12.0001}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 31-12.0001=18.9999 We round that as requested to 19.
